nodes.text: The Naboo system was a large star system located within the Chommell sector of the Mid Rim which contained planets such as Naboo, Erep and Widow as well as their moons. It was centered around the star Naboo. It was kept clean and free of smugglers by the RNSF (Royal Naboo Security Forces) and their trained pilots. However, Hutt crime lords such as Gorr Desilijic Ebelt and Borvo along with their henchmen lurked in the fringes of the system. It was home to humans such as Palpatine & Padmé Amidala, and Gungans such as Jar Jar Binks and Rugor Nass.
